mapper.insert: insert into TBL_FUND_FROZEN_HISTORY ( ACCOUNT_NO, CREATE_DATE, OPERATE_TYPE, AMOUNT, FUND_FROZEN_ID ) values ( #{accountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=com.esinotrans.payment.account.enums.FrozenUnFrozenEnum}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{frozenUnFrozenRecordId,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
